channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【The Sidecar Pattern Explained: Decoupling Operational Features】Sidecar 模式解释：解耦操作功能
item.description: 【Design patterns are reusable solutions to common problems in software design.】设计模式是软件设计中常见问题的可重用解决方案。

item.title: 【How Tinder Recommends To 75 Million Users with Geosharding】Tinder 如何通过地理分片向 7500 万用户推荐
item.description: 【Disclaimer: The details in this post have been derived from the Tinder Technical Blog.】免责声明：本文中的详细信息来自 Tinder 技术博客。

item.title: 【My NEW book, Coding Interview Patterns, is now available on Amazon】我的新书《编码面试模式》现已在亚马逊上发售
item.description: 【My new book, Coding Interview Patterns, is now available on Amazon!】我的新书《编码面试模式》现已在亚马逊上发售！

item.title: 【EP142: The Fundamental Pillars of Object-Oriented Programming】EP142：面向对象编程的基本支柱
item.description: 【Abstraction, Encapsulation, Inheritance, and Polymorphism are the four pillars of object-oriented programming.】抽象、封装、继承和多态是面向对象编程的四大支柱。

item.title: 【How LinkedIn Customizes Its 7 Trillion Message Kafka Ecosystem】LinkedIn 如何定制其 7 万亿消息 Kafka 生态系统
item.description: 【Disclaimer: The details in this post have been derived from the LinkedIn Engineering Blog.】免责声明：本文中的详细信息来自 LinkedIn 工程博客。

item.title: 【EP141: How to Ace System Design Interviews Like a Boss?】EP141：如何像老板一样在系统设计面试中取得好成绩？
item.description: 【They are the most critical components to crafting successful software systems.】它们是构建成功的软件系统的最关键组件。

item.title: 【How Statsig Streams 1 Trillion Events A Day】Statsig 如何每天传输 1 万亿个事件
item.description: 【The newsletter is a collaboration between ByteByteGo and members of the Statsig engineering team (Pablo Beltran and Brent Echols).】该时事通讯是 ByteByteGo 与 Statsig 工程团队成员（Pablo Beltran 和 Brent Echols）合作编写的。

item.title: 【Mastering Modern Authentication: Cookies, Sessions, JWT, and PASETO】掌握现代身份验证：Cookie、Session、JWT 和 PASETO
item.description: 【Authentication serves as the first line of defense in ensuring the security of applications and the sensitive data they handle.】身份验证是确保应用程序及其处理的敏感数据安全的第一道防线。

item.title: 【Database Performance Demystified: Essential Tips and Strategies】数据库性能揭秘：基本技巧和策略
item.description: 【Databases are the backbone of modern applications.】数据库是现代应用程序的支柱。
